1583110.name: Fantasy Grounds - Traps, Trammels, and Triggers - Nefarious Devices for 5E
1583110.description:
Traps, Trammels, and Triggers - Nefarious Devices for 5E

Challenge your players with dastardly traps and puzzles, created for the world's most popular roleplaying game!
Traps, Trammels, and Triggers has over 100 traps (with 150+ more variants), ready to be dropped into a 5E compatible campaign with little preparation. Hinder, maim, or misdirect your players as they charge head-first into a dungeon without investigating their surroundings.
This module contains:
  • 100+ unique traps
  • 150+ variants for more game masters to employ
  • Story entries for each trap, detailing how it can be used
  • Art and tokens
  • A complete reference manual to peruse, detailing each trap as they appear in the book
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Steven Walker and Grim Press Ltd.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
